sentences.en: Bangladesh also lies at the heart of the monsoon belt.
sentences.cn: 孟加拉国也处在季风带的核心.

sentences.en: Cangnan is in the sub - tropical maritime monsoon climate zone.
sentences.cn: 苍南属中亚热带海洋性季风气候区.

sentences.en: Fujian Province in southeastern China, a tropical oceanic monsoon climate.
sentences.cn: 福建在中国的东南部, 属于热带海洋性季风气候.

sentences.en: Guiyang is very wet during the monsoon months of April through August.
sentences.cn: 4月至8月的季雨期,贵阳非常潮湿.

sentences.en: Handan city climate of warm temperate continental monsoon climate, four distinct seasons.
sentences.cn: 邯郸市属暖温带大陆性季风气候, 四季分明.

sentences.en: Jinzhong a warm temperate continental monsoon climate, seasonal changes.
sentences.cn: 晋中属暖温带大陆性季风气候, 季节变化明显.

sentences.en: Lanzhou City climate types are semi - arid north temperate continental monsoon climate.
sentences.cn: 兰州市气候类型属于北温带半干旱大陆性季风气候.

sentences.en: Simultaneously, strong African and East Asian monsoon in summer weakens significantly.
sentences.cn: 同时突变前北非和东亚夏季风增强,而突变后明显减弱.

sentences.en: That became one day in three as the monsoon failed to materialise.
sentences.cn: 而今,因季风迟来变成了每三天才一次供水.

sentences.en: The facts of monsoon climate have been presented in a number of texts and atlases.
sentences.cn: 季风气候的一些事实已在一些教科书和气候图集中加以介绍.

sentences.en: The main climate type in that region is monsoon.
sentences.cn: 那个地区主要以季风气候为主要气候类型.

sentences.en: The monsoon rains started early this year.
sentences.cn: 今年雨季降雨开始得早.

sentences.en: The monsoon will run to the end of the next month.
sentences.cn: 雨季会持续到下个月底.

sentences.en: The south - west monsoon sets in during April.
Travelling is much more difficult during the monsoon.

phrases.tran_cn: 季风降雨；季风降水；季风雨量

trans.tran_cn: （印度洋的）季风，季风雨，夏季季风
trans.tran_en: the season, from about April to October, when it rains a lot in India and other southern Asian countries
